title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Springfield Armory NHS offers many activities and special events for all ages throughout the year. Check in at our News Releases page for the latest announcements from the park. You can even subscribe to the News Release RSS (Real Simple Syndication) feed to receive announcements automatically! For more information about RSS, click the "What is RSS" link next to any current or archived News Release.
